source: Missouri Veterans Commission, St. Patrick Center, VA St. Louis, Start Here STL, Missouri Department of Veterans Affairs

resources.name: Missouri Veterans Commission (MVC)
resources.address: 205 Jefferson Street, 12th Floor, P.O. Drawer 147, Jefferson City, MO 65102-0147
resources.description: State agency providing comprehensive information and assistance regarding benefits through State and Federal Government for all veterans, dependents, and legal representatives

resources.name: St. Patrick Center - Project HERO (Housing, Employment, Recovery, Opportunities)
resources.address: 800 North Tucker Blvd., St. Louis, MO 63101
resources.description: Downtown housing, employment, and recovery services with furnished downtown apartments for veterans transitioning from homelessness

resources.name: St. Patrick Center - Supportive Services for Veteran Families (SSVF)
resources.address: 800 N. Tucker Blvd., St. Louis, MO 63101
resources.description: Rapid re-housing assistance and case management for veteran families in St. Louis City, County, and surrounding counties

resources.name: St. Patrick Center - Homeless Veterans Reintegration Program
resources.address: 800 N. Tucker Blvd., St. Louis, MO 63101
resources.description: Job readiness training with resume building, interview skills, computer training, and job placement assistance for veterans

resources.name: VA Medical Center - John Cochran Division
resources.address: 915 North Grand Blvd., St. Louis, MO 63106
resources.description: VA healthcare facility providing medical care, mental health services, and benefits counseling

resources.name: VA Medical Center - Jefferson Barracks Division
resources.address: 1 Jefferson Barracks Dr., St. Louis, MO 63125
resources.description: VA healthcare facility with medical care, mental health services, and homeless veteran programs

resources.name: Hope Recovery Center/Homeless Veterans Program
resources.address: 515 North Jefferson Ave, St. Louis, MO 63103
resources.description: Transitional, outpatient center with mental health and work programs for homeless veterans

resources.name: Veterans Crisis Line
resources.address: National hotline
resources.description: 24/7 free confidential crisis support for veterans and families experiencing mental health crises, PTSD, suicidal thoughts

resources.name: MOVE: Missouri Veterans Endeavor
resources.address: 8410 Engler Park Ct., St. John, MO 63114
resources.description: Long-term supportive housing for veterans and families addressing homelessness

resources.name: Freedom Place Apartments
resources.address: 4011 Delmar Blvd., St. Louis, MO 63108
resources.description: Furnished apartments in rehabilitated building with veteran services for formerly homeless veterans

resources.name: Release to Rent for Veterans (Criminal Justice Ministries)
resources.address: 2342 LaSalle St., St. Louis, MO 63104
resources.description: Scattered supportive housing for veterans experiencing homelessness with criminal records

resources.name: Employment Connection
resources.address: 2838 Market St., St. Louis, MO 63103
resources.description: Job placement, housing, rental assistance, utilities, and Project Homecoming services

resources.name: The Veterans Consortium Pro Bono Program
resources.address: 2101 L Street NW, Suite 225, Washington, DC 20037
resources.description: Free legal representation for Veterans with Other Than Honorable (OTH) discharges and PTSD/TBI appeals

resources.name: Paralyzed Veterans of America - Gateway Chapter
resources.address: 1311 Lindbergh Plaza Center, St. Louis, MO 63101
resources.description: Medical benefits advocacy and appeals assistance for disabled veterans

resources.name: The Mission Continues
resources.address: 1141 South 7th St., St. Louis, MO 63104
resources.description: Community service engagement and volunteer opportunities for veterans

resources.name: H.E.R.O.E.S. Care
resources.address: 4558 Gravois Village Center, High Ridge, MO 63049
resources.description: Program partners providing support to military families and veterans

resources.name: Veterans for Peace
resources.address: 3407 S. Jefferson Ave., #219, St. Louis, MO 63118
resources.description: International advocacy organization with 120+ chapters addressing peace and war costs

resources.name: Veterans Center St. Louis
resources.address: 287 N. Lindbergh Blvd., Creve Coeur, MO 63141
resources.description: VA counseling and readjustment services with jobs, benefits, healthcare information

resources.name: National Call Center for Homeless Veterans
resources.address: National hotline
resources.description: Emergency housing assistance and referrals for veterans experiencing homelessness

resources.name: Hire Heroes USA
resources.address: National organization
resources.description: Employment assistance and job placement services for veterans overcoming employment barriers

resources.name: Wounded Warrior Project
resources.address: 4899 Belfort Road, Suite 300, Jacksonville, FL 32256
resources.description: Support and services for post-9/11 veterans and service members with physical or mental injuries

resources.name: Start Your Recovery
resources.address: Online resource
resources.description: Chemical dependency assistance developed with clinicians and people in recovery

resources.name: St. Louis County Veterans Program
resources.address: St. Louis County Human Services Department
resources.description: Case management, benefits referral, and assistance with legal, medical, employment, and housing needs

additional_resources.va_st_louis_main: 800-228-5459 or 314-652-4100 - VA St. Louis Medical Center main line
additional_resources.va_benefits: https://benefits.va.gov/stlouis - VA Benefits Administration St. Louis
additional_resources.homeless_veteran_hotline: 1-877-424-3838 - National Call Center for Homeless Veterans

notes: This directory includes major state and federal veteran resources in Missouri. Contact the Missouri Veterans Commission at 573-751-3779 for statewide services. Many resources are located in the St. Louis area, but services extend statewide. Many services are free and confidential.
